duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform basic to advanced installations, disconnects, and service changes for high-speed internet services, phone, and TV.
Provide in-depth customer education on all MetroNet products and services.
Earn commissions by explaining Metronet services and products to all customers.
Be professional with customers and fellow associates.
Have the physical ability to work in various conditions, including working in attics, crawl spaces, and in adverse weather conditions.
Possess the physical ability to work from a kneeling or standing position for long periods.
Climb ladders with proper equipment up to 25 feet and lift and carry loads of up to 75lbs.
Operate and maintain company vehicle/equipment safely and professionally.
Perform on-call rotation duties after regular business hours.
Be available to work overtime when deemed necessary, including holidays and weekends.
Travel for training or as needed.
